data.name: Kalen Chock Presents: Toxic Painting with Q&A
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Here we have a simple 1hr 20 minute video of me painting the image above talking about some techniques all while answering some questions that I have received from different social media outlets. Topics such as , improving , breaking in the industry , freelance , etc.
data.about_the_game: Here we have a simple 1hr 20 minute video of me painting the image above talking about some techniques all while answering some questions that I have received from different social media outlets. Topics such as , improving , breaking in the industry , freelance , etc.
data.short_description: This is a demo talking about techniques and answering questions about improving, breaking in the industry and freelance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
